row.process: !:set &VM_NUMBER#=0 !:set &VARA_NAME_ROOT# = str_cat("VARA.VM.",&METAFLOW_RUNID#) !!:set &NUM# = format(&VM_NUMBER#,"000") ! !!:DEFINE &STRINGS#, string, 500 !:include JOBI.JASON_FILE.ARRAY !:FILL &STRINGS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&TEXT01#,",") ! !:SET &VAR# = 1 !:SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&STRINGS#[]) !!:send_msg AUTOMIC,AUTOMIC,&LEN# ! !:WHILE &VAR# LT &LEN# !!:SET &VAR# = FORMAT(&VAR#,"0") !!:send_msg AUTOMIC,AUTOMIC,"&VAR# : &STRINGS#[&VAR#]" !:IF &STRINGS#[&VAR#] = "" !: SET &VAR# = &LEN# !:ELSE !:if str_find(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],"virtualMachine") > 0 !: set &VM_NUMBER#=&VM_NUMBER# + 1 !: set &VARA_NAME# = str_cat(&VARA_NAME_ROOT#,&VM_NUMBER#) !!: send_msg AUTOMIC,AUTOMIC,&VARA_NAME# !: include JOBI.CREATE.VARA.VM !:endif ! !:set &POS# = str_find(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],"os=") !:if &POS# > 0 !: set &POS# = &POS# + 3 !!: send_msg AUTOMIC,AUTOMIC,str_cut(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],&POS#) !: set &OS# = str_cut(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],&POS#) !: put_var_col &VARA_NAME#,"0000000000000008",2,"&OS#" !:endif ! !:set &POS# = str_find(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],"vpu=") !:if &POS# > 0 !: set &POS# = &POS# + 10 !: set &LEN1# = str_lng(&STRINGS#[&VAR#]) !: set &LEN1# = &LEN1# - &POS# !!: send_msg AUTOMIC,AUTOMIC,str_cut(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],&POS#,&LEN1#) !!: send_msg AUTOMIC,AUTOMIC,"&STRINGS#[&VAR#],&POS#,&LEN1#" !: set &USED# = str_cut(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],&POS#,&LEN1#) !: put_var_col &VARA_NAME#,"0000000000000010",2,"&USED#" !:endif ! !: SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 !:ENDIF !:ENDWHILE ! !
